item.tenergistics.miraculous_machinery.t:
Arcane Machinery Grimoire
by Malama Na'ghftpadgh, the princess of darkness
recipe.tconstruct.tool_repair.fuel_left: There's different fuel in the tank!
stat.tenergistics.gearbox.efficiency.des: The total efficiency of the machine will be multiplied by this.
The total machine speed of the machine will be multiplied by this.
Affects mining speed and attack damage of power tools.
material.tenergistics.malachite.book: It's too bad you can't see the patterns on a sprite this small
item.tenergistics.jackhammer.description:
The Jackhammer is a powered mining tool. It is effective on stone, ores and foes.
Don't forget to charge it!
item.tenergistics.bucketwheel.descriptio:
The Bucketwheel Dredge is a powered digging tool. It rapidly digs up soil and snow.
*powered shovel noises*
item.tenergistics.buzzsaw.description:
The Buzzaxe is a powered tree decimation tool, strong enough to harvest entire trees.
BETA:Harvests a veining pattern.
Bzzz!
modifier.tenergistics.firebox.descriptio:
Allows you to power your machinery with furnace fuels.
Once lit, cannot be extinguished.
modifier.tenergistics.exchanger.descript:
Allows you to power your machinery with smeltery fuels.
Lava not included.
modifier.tenergistics.energy_coil.flavor: The most boring modifier in existence.
modifier.tenergistics.energy_coil.descri:
Allows you to power your machinery with Forge Units.
Zzzzz~t!
modifier.tenergistics.force_field.flavor: Pickaxes are just really small machines!
modifier.tenergistics.force_field.descri:
Allows you to protect your tools with Hearts. At a price.
Don't bore yourself to death.
modifier.tenergistics.force_firebox.desc:
Allows you to power your machinery with furnace fuels.
Once lit, cannot be extinguished.
modifier.tenergistics.force_exchanger.de:
Allows you to power your machinery with smeltery fuels.
Lava not included.
The most boring modifier in existence.

Allows you to power your machinery with Forge Units.
Zzzzz~t!
modifier.tenergistics.capacity.descripti: Allows you to add more fuel to your machinery, regardless of fuel type.
recipe.tenergistics.modifier.capacity_re: Augmented Receptacle requires a power source modifier
modifier.tenergistics.capacity_trait.des: Allows you to add more fuel to your machinery, regardless of fuel type.
modifier.tenergistics.passthrough.descri: Drains fuel from the Melting modifier, or other similar internal tanks.
recipe.tenergistics.modifier.passthrough: Protean Cascade requires a Calefacient Exchanger!
modifier.tenergistics.wide_funnel.flavor: Every tool needs a bucket in it!
modifier.tenergistics.wide_funnel.descri: Allows you to pick up fuel from the world.
recipe.tenergistics.modifier.wide_funnel: Hollow Funnel requires a Calefacient Exchanger!
modifier.tenergistics.rtg.description: Slowly refuels the Effervescent Coil. Forever. Until the end of time.
recipe.tenergistics.modifier.coil_only: Retroinfernal Thermopile Generator requires an Effervescent Coil!
modifier.tenergistics.overclock.descript: Increases the machine stats, but causes it to use exponentially more power.
modifier.tenergistics.overclock_trait.de: Increases the tool stats, but causes it to take exponentially more damage.
modifier.tenergistics.wide_chisel.descri: Expands the Jackhammer, at the cost of some mining speed.
modifier.tenergistics.place_tool.flavor: Do not forget to unlock breathing while you're at it!
modifier.tenergistics.place_tool.descrip: Allows you to place the tool in the world by shift-right clicking.
item.tenergistics.bucketwheel_wheel_red_: Dredge Bucket Wheel Red Sand Cast
